entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -39.4°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -43.4°C
Wind: N 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 45 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 45 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 62 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 45.
